02003                     if(MSHR->when_enqueued < oldest_age)
02004                     {
02005                       oldest_age = MSHR->when_enqueued;
02006                       index = i;
02007                     }
02008                   }
02009                 }
02010 
02011                 /*Try to send the oldest one first*/
02012 
02013                 if(index!=-1)
02014                 {
02015                   struct cache_action_t * MSHR = &cp->MSHR[bank][index];
02016 
02017                   assert((MSHR->cmd == cmd) && MSHR->cb);
02018 
02019                   if(MSHR->MSHR_linked)
02020                   {
02021                     /* this entry combined/coalesced, but still need to invoke miss_cb */
02022                     MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02023                     cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02024                     cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02025                     if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02026                       MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,cp->next_level->latency); /* restarts speculative scheduling */
02027                     sent_something = true;
02028                   }
02029                   else
02030                   {
02031                     cache_assert(!MSHR->MSHR_linked,(void)0);
02032 
02033                       //fprintf(stdout,"\n[%lld][UnCore%d]Uncore Enqueue 0x%llx",sim_cycle,cp->uncore->node_ip,MSHR->paddr);
02034                     if(cp->uncore->enqueuable(MSHR->paddr,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->when_enqueued))
02035                     {
02037                       //if(MSHR->cmd==CACHE_WRITEBACK)
02038                         //MSHR->cmd=CACHE_READ;
02039                       assert(MSHR->cmd!=CACHE_WRITEBACK);
02040                       cp->uncore->enqueue(cp,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->paddr,cp->linesize,MSHR->action_id,bank/* our MSHR bank */,index/*our MSHR index*/,MSHR->op,MSHR->cb,MSHR->get_action_id);
02041                       MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02042                       cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02043                       cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02044                       if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02045                       {
02046                           MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,BIG_LATENCY);
02047                       }
02048                       sent_something = true;
02049                     }              
02050                   }
02051                 }
02052 
02053                 /*Now sending all that can be sent if oldest cannot be sent*/
02054                 for(int i=0;i<cp->MSHR_size;i++)
02055                 {
02056                   struct cache_action_t * MSHR = &cp->MSHR[bank][i];
02057 
02058                   
02059                   if((MSHR->cmd == cmd) && MSHR->cb && (MSHR->when_started == TICK_T_MAX))
02060                   {
02061                         assert((MSHR->cmd == cmd) && MSHR->cb);
02062                         if(MSHR->MSHR_linked)
02063                         {
02064                                 /* this entry combined/coalesced, but still need to invoke miss_cb */
02065                                 MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02066                                 cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02067                                 cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02068                                 if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02069                                  MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,cp->next_level->latency); /* restarts speculative scheduling */
02070                                 sent_something = true;
02071                         }
02072                         else
02073                         {
02074                                 cache_assert(!MSHR->MSHR_linked,(void)0);
02075                                 //fprintf(stdout,"\n[%lld][UnCore%d]Uncore Enqueue 0x%llx",sim_cycle,cp->uncore->node_ip,MSHR->paddr);
02076                                 if(cp->uncore->enqueuable(MSHR->paddr,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->when_enqueued))
02077                                 {
02079                                         //if(MSHR->cmd==CACHE_WRITEBACK)
02080                                         //MSHR->cmd=CACHE_READ;
02081                                         assert(MSHR->cmd!=CACHE_WRITEBACK);
02082                                         cp->uncore->enqueue(cp,MSHR->cmd,MSHR->paddr,cp->linesize,MSHR->action_id,bank/* our MSHR bank */,index/*our MSHR index*/,MSHR->op,MSHR->cb,MSHR->get_action_id);
02083                                         MSHR->when_started = sim_cycle;
02084                                         cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank]--;
02085                                         cache_assert(cp->MSHR_unprocessed_num[bank] >= 0,(void)0);
02086                                         if(MSHR->miss_cb && MSHR->op && (MSHR->action_id == MSHR->get_action_id(MSHR->op)))
02087                                         {
02088                                           MSHR->miss_cb(MSHR->op,BIG_LATENCY);
02089                                         }
02090                                         sent_something = true;
02091                                 }              
02092                         }
02093                   }
02094                 }
02095                 /*Finished sending all requests*/
02096               }
02097             }
02098           }
02099         }
02100   }
02101   cp->check_for_MSHR_work = MSHR_work_found;
02102 
02103 
02104 
02105   /* occupancy stats */
02106   int bank;
02107   int max_size = cp->MSHR_banks * cp->MSHR_size;
02108   int total_occ = 0;
02109   for(bank=0;bank<cp->MSHR_banks;bank++)
02110   {
02111     total_occ += cp->MSHR_num[bank];
02112   }
02113   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.MSHR_occupancy += total_occ;)
02114   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.MSHR_full_cycles += (total_occ == max_size);)
02115 
02116   max_size = cp->MSHR_banks * cp->WBB_size;
02117   total_occ = 0;
02118   for(bank=0;bank<cp->MSHR_banks;bank++)
02119   {
02120     total_occ += cp->WBB_num[bank];
02121   }
02122   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.WBB_occupancy += total_occ;)
02123   CACHE_STAT(cp->stat.WBB_full_cycles += (total_occ == max_size);)
02124 
02125   cp->check_for_work = work_found;
02126 }
02127 
02128 /* Attempt to enqueue a prefetch request, based on the predicted
02129    prefetch addresses in the prefetch FIFO (PFF) */
02130 static void cache_prefetch_llc(struct cache_t * const cp)
02131 {
02132   /* if the PF controller says the bus hasn't been too busy */
02133   if(!cp->PF_sample_interval || (cp->PF_state == PF_OK))
02134   {
02135     /* check prefetch FIFO for new prefetch requests - max one per cycle */
02136     if(cp->PFF && cp->PFF_num)
02137     {
02138       md_paddr_t pf_addr = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].addr;
02139       struct core_t * core = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].core; // tracks originating/owner core
02140       const int bank = GET_MSHR_BANK(pf_addr);
02141 
02142       if((cp->MSHR_num[bank] < cp->prefetch_threshold) /* if MSHR is too full, don't add more requests */
02143          && (cp->MSHR_num_pf[bank] < cp->prefetch_max))
02144       {
02145         md_addr_t pf_PC = cp->PFF[cp->PFF_head].PC;
02146         if(cache_enqueuable(cp,DO_NOT_TRANSLATE,pf_addr))
02147         {
02148           cache_enqueue(core,cp,NULL,CACHE_PREFETCH,DO_NOT_TRANSLATE,pf_PC,pf_addr,(seq_t)-1,bank,NO_MSHR,NULL,dummy_callback,NULL,NULL,NULL);
02149           cp->PFF_head = modinc(cp->PFF_head,cp->PFF_size); //(cp->PFF_head+1) % cp->PFF_size;
02150           cp->PFF_num --;
02151           cache_assert(cp->PFF_num >= 0,(void)0);
02152         }
02153       }
02154     }
02155   }
02156 }
02157 
02158 /* Update the bus-utilization-based prefetch controller. */
02159 static void prefetch_controller_update_llc(struct cache_t * const cp)
02160 {
02161   if(cp->PF_sample_interval && ((sim_cycle % cp->PF_sample_interval) == 0))
02162   {
02163     int current_sample = cp->stat.uncore_utilization;
02164     double duty_cycle = (current_sample - cp->PF_last_sample) / (double) cp->PF_sample_interval;
02165     if(duty_cycle < cp->PF_low_watermark)
02166         cp->PF_state = PF_OK;
02167     else if(duty_cycle > cp->PF_high_watermark)
02168       cp->PF_state = PF_REFRAIN;
02169     /* else stay in current state */
02170     cp->PF_last_sample = current_sample;
02171   }
02172 }
02173 
02174 void step_LLC_PF_controller(struct uncore_t * const uncore)
02175 {
02176   /* update prefetch controllers */
02177   prefetch_controller_update_llc(uncore->LLC);
02178 }
02179 
02180 void prefetch_LLC(struct uncore_t * const uncore)
02181 {
02182   cache_prefetch_llc(uncore->LLC);
02183 }
02184 
02185 /* Make use of the bus, thereby making it NOT free for some number of cycles hence */
02186 void uncore_utilize(struct cache_t * const cp)
02187 {
02188   /*This keeps track of the number of times the uncore is accesed, It is used to make prefetch decisions, Originally zesto used the stat of FSB utilization*/
02189   cp->stat.uncore_utilization += 1;
02190 }
